To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107

Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:




The three "brothers" watched the small battle at the Cybertronian Fire with 
slight interest.

"Should we even bother, Demon Wulf, my brother?  It's only a small fight, and 
beating the Maximals is rather boring." Flesh Ripper said, his optics 
magnifying what was before his eyes a couple of times.

"It's true, brethren.  But it's a small battle.  Not much resistance.  And 
what is our goal?" Demon Wulf asked with a sick grin.

"To slaughter all Cybertronians." Dark Claw replied, showing his fangs.

"Exactly." Demon Wulf said, pointed a clawed finger towards the battle scene. 
 "We will attack, and kill.  We will choose one target at a time." 

And with that, the three Vok creations set off, Dark Claw transforming to his 
attack vehicle mode and the brothers headed at full speed towards the 
Cybertronian Fire.
